'''''Waterworld Future''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to [[diving|dive]] for the first time.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->==Trivia==

* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to the 1995 American film ''{{w|Waterworld}}'', set in a post-apocalyptic future where the surface of the Earth has become completely submerged due to rising sea levels.
